name: INConditionalOperator
desc: Constants indicating how search attributes are interpreted.

items.name: case all
items.desc: All relevant attributes must be present for the search to yield a match. This is equivalent to an AND operator.

items.name: case any
items.desc: One or more of the relevant attributes must be present for the search to yield a match. This is equivalent to an OR operator.

items.name: case none
items.desc: None of the specified attributes must be present for the search to yield a match.
